Group Non-Disclosure Agreement

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1001&user=10620> 	

To protect the Group’s interests, the Legal Department has updated our Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA). 

This latest version should be used when engaging with external parties (e.g., service providers or other third parties) and sharing confidential information.

Click here to access the NDA <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1001&user=10620>

This latest version should be used when engaging with external parties (e.g., service providers or other third parties) and sharing confidential information.

Click here to access the NDA <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1001&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-6-min.png> 	
Creating impact Around our people pillar 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1002&user=10620> 	

The People pillar is structured around five fundamental tenets:

*	One Team, One Culture
*	Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion
*	Talent Strategy
*	Healthy and Safe Workplace
*	Impact to Wider Community

Each of these elements is intricately connected to the wider goals outlined in our strategy, contributing to Chalhoub Group’s holistic approach to sustainability. These focus areas collectively form the cornerstone of our commitment to nurturing a workforce that is empowered and is deeply engaged with the communities we serve.
They reflect our efforts to building an environment where individuals can flourish, ideas can thrive, and meaningful change can take root. 
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1002&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-2-min.png> 	

People in Focus | Noor Almeshal

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1003&user=10620> 	

Meet Noor Almeshal, our Managing Director for Kuwait, an example of national talent and a woman in leadership.

chunks.text:
<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1003&user=10620> 	

Meet Noor Almeshal, our Managing Director for Kuwait, an example of national talent and a woman in leadership.

With a dynamic background in Finance and Technology, Noor brings a powerful blend of experience from corporate environments and the startup world. This unique combination has shaped her into a strategic and structured leader, while remaining agile and adaptable - essential qualities in today’s fast-evolving retail business.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1003&user=10620> 


 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-7-min.png> 	

Welcome to our new Joiner

Omayma Altahini Joins us as our Senior Associate – People Partner, in Jeddah KSA - reporting directly to Sara Hegazi.
Omayma brings a strong and diverse background in HR, brand management, and operational support, with prior experience at Chalhoub Group, MTE Trading, and F+U Academy of Languages.
In her new role, Omayma will serve as the HR support for the Logistics and Operations functions, supporting our teams with strategic and day-to-day people-related matters.


 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/038d46d22147e11755a2fd5f68a33a27817084333.png> 	
For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1004&user=10620>
